text: Uttlesford is a local government district in Essex, England. Its council is based in the town of Saffron Walden. The district also includes the town of Great Dunmow and numerous villages, including Stansted Mountfitchet, Takeley, Elsenham, Thaxted, and Newport. The district covers a largely rural area in the north-west of Essex. London Stansted Airport is in the district. In 2023 the District Council was ranked ninth worst authority in England for debt. It had borrowed Â£302 million for investments in property. ==References== Category:Uttlesford
title: Uttlesford
